name: Shepherds Hunt
description:
Shepherds Hunt is an animal themed match three game made by a small team at UW-Whitewater. Follow a story of heroism as you unlock playable characters with unique abilities while defeating the evil animals tormenting the animals across the lands. Do be careful as the evil animals try to prevent you from saving others.

Developers:

Art&Design: Hannah Shumaker & Lou Jensen

Story by: Elijia Knight

Sound Design: Ted Newton

Programmers: Tyler Marinkovic, Jeff Meyer & Cole Bollig
